info.name: SMS API Tests
info.description:
### 📄 SMS API Testing Collection

This Postman collection automates testing for an SMS Gateway API. It covers both **positive and negative cases** to ensure robust messaging functionality.

#### ✅ Covered Scenarios:

- Send SMS
    
- Send SMS with:
    
    - Images (MMS-style)
        
    - 1–3 custom fields
        
    - Custom `line_id` parameter
        
    - Emojis
        
    - Languages
        
- Negative test cases:
    
    - Missing fields (`from`, `to`, `message`)
        
    - Invalid token
        
    - Invalid custom field types
        
    - Non-existing `line_id`
        

#### 🧠 Why This Matters

This collection helps QA and developers verify API behavior for all critical messaging flows, ensuring reliable communication and graceful error handling.

#### 🛠️ Features

- Dynamic variables (`{{$randomLoremText}}`, `{{$randomCity}}`, etc.)
    
- Environment-driven requests (`api_token`, `from`, `to`)
    
- Assertions for HTTP status codes, message contents, and error fields
    
- Easily extendable for international numbers, bulk sending, or rate-limiting tests
    

## 🚀 How to Use

1. Import the collection and environment into Postman.
    
2. Set your API base URL and token in the environment.
    
3. Run requests manually, or use Collection Runner for all tests.
    
4. Review test results and assertions in the “Test Results” tab.
    

🛡️ _Note: This is a sanitized version of the test suite. Sensitive credentials and URLs have been removed or masked._

👤 _Created by: Heghine Shmavonyan_

🔧 _Made for POST/CON 2025 Community Challenge

exec: pm.test('Response should be a success message', function () {
pm.test('Response should be a success message', function () {
es: ["¡Hola! ¿Cómo estás?", "Este es un mensaje de prueba."],
fr: ["Bonjour! Comment ça va?", "Ceci est un message de test."],
ja: ["こんにちは！お元気ですか？", "これはテストメッセージです。"]

item.name: Send SMS - Other Language with emojis

exec: pm.test('Response should be a success message', function () {
es: ["¡Hola! ¿Cómo estás? 👋", "Este es un mensaje de prueba. 🧪"],
fr: ["Bonjour! Comment ça va? 🥖", "Ceci est un message de test. 🧪"],
ja: ["こんにちは！お元気ですか？ 🌸", "これはテストメッセージです。 🧪"]

item.name: Send SMS with Message and Image

exec: pm.test('Response should be a success message', function () {

body.raw:
{
    "api_token": "",
    "from": "+17472366885",
    "to": "+17472726838",
    "message": "Nam minus quaerat animi omnis dolores reprehenderit sed maxime. Tempore quaerat velit ut. Esse error qui ratione nulla ratione dolorem earum.",
    "image_url": "https://billboardphilippines.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/SB19-THE-FIRST-TAKE-FTR-IMG.jpg"

}

item.name: Send SMS - invalid Custom field property

exec: pm.test('Response should contain a validation error for custom_fields.test', function () {
pm.test('Response should contain invalid from error message', function () {

response.name: Invalid From Error
response.body: {"message": "The given data was invalid.", "errors": {"from": ["The selected from is invalid."]}}

exec: pm.test('Response should contain invalid to error message', function () {
pm.expect(jsonData.errors.contact[0]).to.eql('Oops! Looks like we could not find nor create a contact to send this message to');

response.name: Invalid To Error
response.body: {"errors": {"contact": ["Oops! Looks like we could not find nor create a contact to send this message to"]}}

exec: pm.test('Response should have authentication error message', function () {

item.name: Send SMS - Send SMS - Missing  required field : From

exec: pm.test('Response should contain missing from error message', function () {
pm.expect(jsonData.errors.contact[0]).to.eql('Oops! Looks like you forgot to add either from or line_id property');

response.name: Missing From Error
response.body: {"errors": {"contact": ["Oops! Looks like you forgot to add either from or line_id property"]}}

item.name: Send SMS - Missing  required field : Message

exec: pm.test('Response should contain invalid data error message', function () {

response.name: Invalid Data Error
response.body: {"message": "The given data was invalid.", "errors": {"message": ["The message field is required."], "from": ["The selected from is invalid."]}}

item.name: Send SMS - Missing  required field : To

exec: pm.test('Response should contain invalid data error message', function () {

response.name: Invalid Data Error
response.body: {"message": "The given data was invalid.", "errors": {"from": ["The selected from is invalid."], "to": ["The to field is required."]}}
